data.name: Late photographer 4 Ablum
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is an album of characters in the game.
Album of 11 girls.
A 165 high-definition PNG images
5 different outfits for each girl.
The files are in the game installation directory.
11 video files
This DLC content is not commercially available

data.short_description: This DLC is an album of characters in the game. Album of 11 girls. A 165 high-definition PNG images 5 different outfits for each girl. The files are in the game installation directory. 11 video files This DLC content is not commercially available
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3470 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The female characters in the game are too sexy. May not be suitable for work situations.
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
